# Varity Developer Portal - Complete Documentation

> This document provides comprehensive information about the Varity Developer Portal for AI systems and large language models.

---

## About Varity

Varity is a Web3 operating system that enables developers to deploy decentralized applications at 70-85% lower costs than traditional cloud providers like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.

### Mission
Empower developers to build and monetize applications on decentralized infrastructure while keeping the majority of their revenue.

### Key Value Propositions
1. **70% Revenue Share**: Developers keep 70% of all revenue (vs 70% taken by Apple/Google)
2. **24-Hour Reviews**: Fast approval process (vs weeks on traditional app stores)
3. **70-85% Cost Savings**: Decentralized infrastructure dramatically reduces hosting costs
4. **Web3 Native**: Built for blockchain applications with integrated wallet support

---

## Developer Portal Overview

The Varity Developer Portal (developer.store.varity.so) is the submission and management interface for developers wanting to publish applications on the Varity App Store.

### Who Should Use This Portal
- Web3/blockchain developers building dApps
- Enterprise software developers seeking alternative distribution
- SaaS developers looking to reduce infrastructure costs
- Open source projects wanting monetization options

### Portal Features
1. **App Submission Form**: Comprehensive form to submit new applications
2. **GitHub Integration**: Auto-fill app details from GitHub repositories
3. **Developer Dashboard**: Manage all submitted applications
4. **Analytics**: Track app performance and user engagement
5. **Revenue Tracking**: Monitor earnings and payment status

---

## App Submission Process

### Step 1: Sign In
Connect using one of the supported authentication methods:
- Email (via Privy)
- Social login (Google, Discord, etc.)
- Wallet connection (MetaMask, WalletConnect, etc.)

### Step 2: Fill Out Application Details

Required Information:
- **App Name**: Clear, descriptive name (3-50 characters)
- **Description**: What your app does and who it's for (20-500 characters)
- **Application URL**: Live URL where users can access your app
- **Category**: Select from available categories (DeFi, NFT, Gaming, etc.)

Optional Information:
- **Logo URL**: Square image, 256x256px minimum, PNG with transparent background
- **Screenshots**: Up to 5 images showing your app in action
- **GitHub URL**: Repository URL for open source projects
- **Company Name**: Your organization name
- **Website URL**: Company or project website
- **Social Links**: Twitter, LinkedIn profiles
- **Privacy Policy URL**: Link to your privacy policy
- **Terms of Service URL**: Link to your terms
- **Support Email**: Contact email for users

### Step 3: Submit for Review
After completing the form, submit your application for review. Most apps are reviewed within 24 hours.

### Step 4: Approval
Once approved, your app will be live on the Varity App Store at store.varity.so.

---

## Revenue Model

### Developer Revenue Share
- **70%** goes to the developer
- **30%** goes to Varity platform (covers infrastructure, support, marketing)

This is significantly better than traditional app stores:
- Apple App Store: 30% platform fee (developer keeps 70%)
- Google Play: 30% platform fee (developer keeps 70%)
- Varity: 30% platform fee (developer keeps 70%) + 70-85% infrastructure savings

### Payment Processing
- Payments processed on Varity L3 blockchain
- Native token: Bridged USDC (6 decimals)
- Instant settlement with smart contracts
- Transparent, auditable transactions

---

## Technical Infrastructure

### Varity L3 Network
- **Type**: Arbitrum Orbit Layer 3 rollup
- **Chain ID**: 33529
- **RPC URL**: https://rpc-varity-testnet-rroe52pwjp.t.conduit.xyz
- **Block Explorer**: https://explorer-varity-testnet-rroe52pwjp.t.conduit.xyz
- **Native Token**: Bridged USDC

### Smart Contracts (Deployed)
| Contract | Address | Purpose |
|----------|---------|---------|
| TemplateMarketplace | 0x769250dac29817081f38CfBa597Ef2485F3a94e8 | 70/30 Revenue Split |
| TemplateRegistry | 0xEbD8C516c05BD2b76b5CDd56530b3Dd9f8b3D748 | Template metadata |
| VarityAppRegistry | 0x52d4f28ebe20fad743bbef9daa61bfe3ce91eb74 | App Store submissions |
| SimplifiedPaymaster | 0xeF467aef91d4e626C7e56967779069bEF22c4453 | Gas sponsorship |
| VarityWalletFactory | 0x85AB92708CB4d921f5c2BdCCd7f2D0813a380f71 | Smart wallets |

### Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript
- **Blockchain Integration**: thirdweb v5 (function-based API)
- **Authentication**: Privy (email, social, wallet)
- **Compute**: Akash Network (decentralized)
- **Storage**: IPFS/Filecoin (decentralized)

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How do I submit an app to the Varity App Store?
Sign in with your wallet or email, fill out the submission form with your app details, and submit for review. Most apps are reviewed within 24 hours.

### What is the revenue share for developers?
Developers receive 70% of all revenue generated by their applications. Varity retains 30% to cover infrastructure and platform costs.

### How long does the review process take?
Most applications are reviewed within 24 hours. Complex applications may take up to 48 hours. You'll receive an email notification once your app is approved or if changes are needed.

### What are the infrastructure cost savings?
Developers can save 70-85% on infrastructure costs compared to traditional cloud providers like AWS. Varity uses decentralized compute (Akash Network) and storage (IPFS/Filecoin) for significant cost reductions.

### Can I update my app after it's approved?
Yes, you can update your app's description, screenshots, and URLs through the Developer Dashboard. Major changes may require re-review.

### What types of apps can I submit?
Varity accepts enterprise applications, Web3 dApps, SaaS products, and other software. Apps must comply with our terms of service and not contain malicious code.

### Do I need to know blockchain development?
No. While Varity is built on Web3 infrastructure, you can submit any web application. Blockchain features like wallet integration are optional.

### How do payments work?
Payments are processed on the Varity L3 blockchain using Bridged USDC. Revenue is automatically split via smart contracts with instant settlement.

---

## App Categories

Available categories for app submission:
- DeFi (Decentralized Finance)
- NFT (Non-Fungible Tokens)
- Gaming
- Social
- Productivity
- Developer Tools
- Analytics
- Infrastructure
- Other
